Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics

Interface JvmPauseMonitorSource

All Known Subinterfaces:
MetricsRegionServerSource, MetricsRESTSource, MetricsThriftServerSource
All Known Implementing Classes:
MetricsRegionServerSourceImpl, MetricsRESTSourceImpl, MetricsThriftServerSourceImpl
@Private public interface JvmPauseMonitorSource
Interface for sources that will export JvmPauseMonitor metrics
